## API Key Vault

Store and manage your API keys securely.
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/93590692/495181021-b2394ca3-fc98-49e6-936d-1f65d4ed3a69.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..DL2KiGgmJ-3KNXVBROStU7QBUl36uJHjFOXL0m9hj0c" >

### Stack
- Backend: Express (Node.js)
- Frontend: React (Next.js)
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL via psql/CLI)
<<<<<<< HEAD
- Auth: Firebase Authentication (frontend)
=======
- Auth: Firebase Authentication

### Features
- Create, view, and delete stored API keys
- Secure auth flow and protected routes

- Bulk testing of all api keys

### Development
bash
# backend
<<<<<<< HEAD
cd backend && npm install && npm run dev

# frontend
cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run dev


### Deployment
- Frontend: Firebase Hosting (static export)
- Backend: Node/Express (deploy as you prefer)

### Live
- https://YOUR-LIVE-LINK-HERE
=======
cd backend && npm install && npm start

# frontend
cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
```

### Deployment
- Frontend: Firebase Hosting 
- Backend: Hosted on Render
